primaryState.name: pass
primaryState.description: test is successfully passing on resource

primaryState.name: noFault
primaryState.description: test has failed but resource is not at fault for error (e.g., a destination server is down)

primaryState.name: missing
primaryState.description: the test result is missing (i.e., the test is new and has not yet executed on the resource)

secondaryState.name: down
secondaryState.description: resource is unavailable due to a planned outage

secondaryState.name: na
secondaryState.description: test is not appliable to resource

secondaryState.name: stale
secondaryState.description: test result is stale (i.e., no new test results have been received). This can happen when a resource has become unreachable.

secondaryState.name: warnings
secondaryState.description: successful test result but warnings have been found.
